lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors want a Miami judge to reduce by more than a year the prison sentence being served by Anthony Bosch, the former owner of the clinic.
snippet: Federal prosecutors want a Miami judge to reduce by more than a year the prison sentence being served by Anthony Bosch, the former owner of the clinic.
abstract: Federal prosecutors request that four-year prison sentence of Anthony Bosch, former owner of Biogenesis of America clinic, which supplied banned substances to Major League Baseball players, be reduced to 32 months for cooperation; other baseball news noted.
